title: Problem happened with macOS gameplay in latest update

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Does anyone get the same issue as mine?
I've tried reinstalled league and relaunch macOS, but once I entered the loading screen and in-game stage.
 I got only 1/4 screen showing the game. 

To Riot: TRY HELP WITH IT PLEASE. Even challenger rank can't play under this weird situation.

replies.body:
It works all fine for me after changing the resolution from 1280x800 to 1440x900.

FYI, My mac is 13-inch retina.

Yeah, there's been quite a few reports and we're investigating it now.  I'll be putting a sticky post up shortly, but so far players have been able to perform a workaround by tapping Alt+Enter in-game.  This will toggle you out of fullscreen and into a windowed mode to restore your resolution.  I'm also trying to find the origin here, possibly a resolution setting.  What resolution are you currently at in-game?  What happens if you lower it?  Thanks for the info!
Exact same thing happened to me.  This caused me to lose a promo game.
